data.title: News and Gossip
data.text:
BREAK OUT THE HIP HOP!

Break out your beach gear, break out the sunscreen and break out the hip hop 'cause Summer is here! Sony wants to heat it up with the hottest Sony electronics, plus the latest CD's from breakin' new aritsts Sarai and ATL plus CDs from B2K, Ginuwine, Nas & more! Click here to enter to win! B2K NOMINATED FOR 2003 MTV MUSIC AWARD

Congratulations to our boys B2K on their nomination for Best Group Video "Bump, Bump, Bump". Make sure to watch the MTV VMA's on Thursday, August 28, 2003. WATCH A CLIP OF "WHAT A GIRL WANTS"

WindowsMedia [ 56k | 100k | 300k ]

RealVideo [ all speeds ]

QuickTime [ all speeds ]

Vote for B2K's video on BET 106 & Park by calling 800-617-LIVE between 5:30-6:00pm ET or vote online at: www.bet.com/106andpark

Also, vote for "What A Girl Wants" on MTV's TRL. Vote online or call: 1-800-DIAL-MTV

CALL from 12:30PM - 1:00PM (Eastern Time)

CALL from 11:30AM - 12:00PM (Central Time)

CALL from 10:30AM - 11:00PM (Mountain Time)

CALL from 9:30AM - 10:00AM (Pacific Time)

A BIG CONGRATULATIONS TO B2K!

B2K won two BET Awards during the 3rd annual BET Awards ceremony which broadcasted live from LA on Tuesday, June 24th. They brought home the awards for Best Group and the Viewer's Choice Award! This makes it two years in a row for B2K to win the Viewer's Choice Award. Thanks to you all for voting! Let's do it again next year!!!

B2K THE REMIXES VOLUME 2 IN STORES NOW!

Check out the tracklisting for their remix album...and listen to clips of all the songs here

CLICK HERE TO ORDER THE REMIXES VOLUME 2!

B2K SINGLE IN STORES JULY 8, 2003!

You'll be able to own the B2K & P. Diddy single "Bump, Bump, Bump" starting July 8th! You can pre-order it now!

B2K NOMINATED FOR TWO TEEN CHOICE AWARDS!Congrats to B2K for being nominated for 2 Teen Choice Awards:

"Choice Music: Hip-Hop/R&B Artist"

"Choice Music: Single (Bump Bump Bump) w/ P. Diddy"

SCREAM III TOUR DATES ANNOUNCED!Dates and cities have been announced for this year's SCREAM III Tour with B2K, Marques Houston, Mario and Nick Cannon! Get 'em now on the Tour page!

B2K's Ultimate Video Collection has hit record shelves everywhere, and is filled with over 60 minutes of B2K videos and behind-the-scenes-footage, as well as a Biography on the guys. Included are the "Uh Huh," "Gots Ta Be," "Bump, Bump, Bump" (B2K and P. Diddy) and "Girlfriend" videos. As a special bonus feature, The Ultimate Video Collection includes an exclusive extended version of "Girlfriend" featuring Will Smith, Vivica Fox and Ronald Isley, and behind-the-scenes at the "Girlfriend" video shoot! Order The Ultimate Video Collection Online and get it delivered directly to your doorstep!

B2K TAKES NICK'S "FAVORITE GROUP"!!

B2K took home the award for Favorite Group at Nickelodeon's 16th Annual Kids' Choice Awards!!! Thanks to all the fans who voted for B2K and won the guys this honor! The awards were held on April 12, 2003 in Los Angeles, CA. According to Billboard Bulletin: Saturday's event at the Barker Hangar in Santa Monica, Calif., found kids screaming for B2K as they performed a "My Girl"/"Girlfriend" medley, with fans hanging on their every word and greeting them with shouts of "We love you!"

Check out all the winners at Nick.com!!

B2K's "GIRLFRIEND" TAKES #1!!!!B2K's new "Girlfriend" video took the top spot on MTV's TRL Countdown! A BIG UP TO ALL THE FANS FOR ROCKING THE VOTE!!! The clip is a mini-movie featuring Will Smith, Vivica Fox, and Ron Isley. Help B2K keep it on top by calling and requesting it every weekday at 1.800.DIAL.MTV from 3:30-4PM (ET) / 12:30-1PM (PT)! VOTE ONLINE, TOO, 24/7. Thanks for the support!

REQUEST "GIRLFRIEND" ON BET's 106 & Park, TOO

Blow up the request lines at 1.800.617.LIVE from 5:30-6PM

B2K's NEW pandemonium! SPECIAL EDITION CD/DVD HAS HIT STORES EVERYWHERE!!!!

B2K went into the studio and recorded some brand new songs! The first one that you've been hearing all over radio is "Girlfriend," and it's on the pandemonium! Special Edition CD/DVD, a brand new version of pandemonium! that's in stores everywhere now!! This package features three more previously unreleased songs -- all written and produced by R. Kelly -- that you can't get anywhere else! There's all kinds of other fresh stuff included, too, like B2K tattoos, and a bonus DVD with 30 minutes of footage of B2K doin' "behind-the scenes" stuff, you know.... The pandemonium! Special Edition CD/DVD will also let you unlock bonus audio and video RIGHT HERE at b2klovesyou.com -- including an exclusive "Girlfriend" (Pied Piper) remix AND the full-length "Girlfriend" video which is an extended mini-movie featuring Will Smith, Vivica Fox, and Ron Isley! Get Details On How You Can Get ConnecteD To All This Exclusive Content Here! Check out B2K's "Girlfriend (Pied Piper Remix)" WM (Lo-Fi) | WM (Med-Fi) | WM (Hi-Fi) | REAL | QuickTime. Get ConnecteD to the full-length version Here!!!!!

Get Your B2K Added Value Poster!

Purchase B2K's pandemonium! Special Edition (in stores NOW) and receive a free B2K poster!

WATCH A CLIP OF "GIRLFRIEND" HERE!

WindowsMedia [ 56k | 100k | 300k ]

RealVideo [ all speeds ]

QuickTime [ all speeds ]

CONGRATULATIONS TO B2K ON THEIR TWO SOUL TRAIN AWARDS!

On Saturday, March 1, 2003, B2K were big winners at the 17th Annual Soul Train Music Awards, taking two home: Best R&B/Soul Single (Group, Band, or Duo) - "Bump, Bump, Bump" and Best R&B/Soul Album (Group, Band, Duo). Congrats to B2K!

ROCK THE REQUEST LINES FOR B2K!

Let your local radio stations know you want to hear more of B2K's new "Girlfriend" single! Find the station in your area Here and thanks again for the support!

TRL RETIRES "BUMP, BUMP, BUMP" FROM THE TRL COUNTDOWN!

On Friday, January 31, B2K & P. Diddy's "Bump, Bump, Bump" video hit 50 days on the TRL Countdown and was officially retired with honors. Congrats to B2K and a huge thanks to all the fans for the unending support!

WATCH FULL-LENGTH "BUMP, BUMP, BUMP" HERE!

WindowsMedia [ 56k | 100k | 300k ]

RealVideo [ all speeds ]

QuickTime [ all speeds ]

"BUMP, BUMP, BUMP" #1, #1, #1 & #1! B2K's "Bump, Bump, Bump" single has taken #1 spots on the Urban Mainstream, Top 40 Rhythm, AND CHR/Rhythm Charts, and on Billboard's Hot 100 Chart!!! Congrats to B2K and thanks to all of the fans who requested it on their local radio stations!!!

B2K'S pandemonium! HAS ARRIVED IN STORES EVERYWHERE

FEATURING FOUR LIMITED EDTION, AUTOGRAPHED COVERS, AND ACCESS TO EXCLUSIVE B2K CONTENT!

CHECK IT OUT: PC | MAC AND TELL A FRIEND! B2K's brand new album, pandemonium!, has hit stores everywhere! B2K wrote the majority of songs on the album which features special, limited edition covers of each of the guys...and they're each AUTOGRAPHED! They'll only be available for a limited time, so get your favorite B2K Member NOW - or collect all 4 while supplies last! There's also a fifth cover with all four guys. The pandemonium! CD itself will also hook you up with videos from B2Ks video shoot & photo shoots, as well as in-studio "making of" pandemonium! footage! Once you have the CD, CLICK HERE to get ConnecteD!

The first single from pandemonium! is B2K and P. Diddy's "Bump, Bump, Bump." B2K recently shot the video with Erik White -- the director of "Uh Huh" and "Why I love You." GET YOUR EXCLUSIVE B2K POSTER! Select retail stores across the country are giving away an exclusive B2K poster with the purchase of pandemonium!! For more details on how and where you can get yours, call your local Participating Retail Store!

CONGRATS TO B2K ON THEIR BILLBOARD MUSIC AWARD!!! B2K was just awarded the Billboard Music Award for "Biggest Selling R&B Single Of The Year - 'Uh Huh'"!!!

DOWNLOAD AN EXCLUSIVE B2K TRACK!

Check out "Tease" featuring Jhene at MTV.com!

IF YOU WANNA CHECK OUT EXCLUSIVE pandemonium! CONTENT, THEN GET THE SANTA HOOKED ME UP CD AND CLICK HERE IN STORES EVERYWHERE:

SANTA HOOKED ME UP

AND

LIVE AT THE HOUSE OF BLUES! The holidays will soon be here and B2K wants to hook you up. Their brand new Christmas album, Santa Hooked Me Up, just arrived in stores everywhere! Get a taste of it right here, and spread the word to all your friends: PC MAC

The album includes production by Platinum Status, a bonus track by Jhene and appearances by Batman, IMX and TG4! The CD is also your key to unlocking cool pandemonium! stuff right here at b2klovesyou.com, including a special B2K screen saver, wallpaper, a stream of "Bump Bump Bump" and a special audio greeting from B2K! Click Here to access the special content! And be sure and check out the special CD Extra content also featured on Santa Hooked Me Up!

B2K's NEW DVD, LIVE AT THE HOUSE OF BLUES ALSO IN STORES NOW! The DVD features their live show from the House Of Blues in Los Angeles, CA PLUS the making of and the full-length "Why I Love You" video! Be sure and check it out!!!
